content: {"name": "Ethos Rogerson House (LGBTQ)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For more information or to register to attend a Community Cafe near you, please call 617-477-6688 or email ethosmeals@ethocare.org", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ethocare.org/services/nutrition/community-cafes/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "Beaufort Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Jamaica Hills", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02130", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3166553, "longitude": -71.11423040000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 477-6688", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required by phone"}]}
